replies.body: {{champion:412}} Do you have any Soul Food?

You cooked it at too high an ELO. Bronze kebabs would never escape from you.
Are these real?... "MOM! MOM WARM UP THE STOVE!"
Yup! All these recipes are tried, tested, and delicious. Pls don't burn down your house.

You people eat chicken hearts?
I love a good chicken heart

Everyone loves a good chicken heart, you know just chop off its head let it run around a little and then reach your hand in rip out its heart while drinking the blood from its veins like a gogurt, then eating the still beating heart....... Delicious

Pics or it didn't happen. :3
Do i haz to use chicken hearts. I wanna try the kalista kabobs but do you think it would be good if i marinated chicken breasts instead of chicken hearts? :3

> [{quoted}](name=AntarcticHeatFTW,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=u78pishu,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-08-19T19:40:00.668+0000)
>
> Do i haz to use chicken hearts. I wanna try the kalista kabobs but do you think it would be good if i marinated chicken breasts instead of chicken hearts? :3

Chicken breast would work fine, but you would get a more flavorful/chicken-y result if you used chicken thigh meat.  No need to bake them as long as you don't use pieces that are too big, and ensure you grill them until cooked all the way through!
I love how the Rioters are so concerned for our safety, "Don't burn down your house" and "Cook your chicken all the way through"... Thanks Riot for showing you really care about the community! <3

{{champion:74}} Jessie, we need to cook.

Admittedly, I don't know a Jessie, but hey, references!
Make sure dyrus doesn't get his hands on these recipe or else.... gg tsm house
What is a house to an Emperor?{{champion:268}}
Could we do hard boiled eggs instead of tomatoes if we arent fond of tomatoes for the eyes for the noodles :O
Definitely! I've also heard of someone using meatballs or sausage to replace the tomatoes with a more meaty substitute.
Hey, what's {{champion:412}}'s favorite food? FLAY MINION (filet minion)!
this is excellent

I would've said fried chicken, hushpuppies, maybe cornbread.

Y'know, soul food.

Filet mignon*



I'm sorry ._.
infinite breadsticks {{champion:429}}  please.
Olive Garden Kalista confirmed.
I particularly love how the Amunoodles specifically note that they only serve 1. Even in noodle form, Amumu is forever alone. Looking forward to trying these.

> [{quoted}](name=Randomikari,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=u78pishu,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-08-19T19:39:27.698+0000)
>
> I particularly love how the Amunoodles specifically note that they only serve 1. Even in noodle form, Amumu is forever alone. Looking forward to trying these.

The lightly-salted water for cooking the pasta is there to represent his tears, also.  Cooked in his own tears.

Man I want to make these.  Sadly I have never tried Chicken Hearts and I don't know if I have the balls to.  I think I will make the Krugettes though; if I do I plan on coming back with some pictures. ^^

Speaking of, I think some photos of these meals would have gone great in this thread.  That food colouring lol.

Ask and ye shall recieve! (Super super poorly done pictures, pls don't judge too hard!) 

Here's a picture of Amumoodles:
http://i.imgur.com/g8SNbjp.png

and here's a picture of Krugettes:
http://i.imgur.com/L5O68TB.jpg
Rofl the amunoodles look freaking hilarious.  Thanks for the pics ^^

"I'll have 2 helpings of Kalista Kebabs and 4 Kruggets please."

"May you like to try a free sample of Amumoodles?"

"Sure, why not."

(Food is brought out.)

Now that I've finished, lets try these Amumoodles."

(Takes bite.)

"Wow, I love these. How did they make this?"

"With Amumu's tears, of course."

(Amumu is seen through a window crying. The man then throws up.)
Delicous

omg really you gotta take it that way they condone it because not only do they eat meat but most of the league community eat meat so would u please stfu with this shit this isnt a vegetarian complaint forum this is a lol based food forum maybe they will make the red bramble back salad for u sometime but till then stop with this shit

My friend, you're welcome to your own beliefs, but it is incorrect and unfair to impose them as moral absolutes. There is nothing wrong with eating other animals, and it is not by any means, as you say, murder. To murder is to kill another human. That is all. They may be innocent, but they do to need to be "guilty" to provide food to creatures who are omnivorous (like us) or carnivores. I understand you feel emotionally connected to them, but this is not the place to argue about vegitatianism. This is Riot. We should be complaining about why graves can't have a cigar ({{champion:104}} {{item:3070}}) . 

Addendum: just because my friend above did not give an "articulate" comment, doesn't make his points any less valid
I believe the tear goes out of his eye{{item:3070}} {{champion:104}}
Did anyone else read this in Tahm Kench's voice? Or was it just me?
{{champion:223}}  can have a cook book... but graves can't have a cigar? {{champion:104}}  {{item:3070}}
Cook books help you make yummy meals. Cigars do bad things to your mouth hole so you enjoy said yummy meals less.
Food makes you obese which can give you heart attacks bruh
The only solution is to make food illegal. {{item:2009}} {{item:2009}} {{item:2009}}

Glyceroll you are seriously awesome you are always on the forums... and i saw that you were majoring in something related to cooking so i  assume you helped make these recipes with Mr.Kench?

Haha thanks!!

I'm majoring in Food Science right now and working in the NA Editorial/Publishing dept at Riot (makes SO much sense). The recipes were actually entirely the brainchild of Bioluminescence! I ate them though if that counts? {{champion:223}}
the skewers in my Kalista kebabs keep disappearing  after a while. how do i fix that? {{champion:5}} offered me a tip. not sure if it would work.

So this "Kalista kebab" Why food coloring? Do you even see blue color after "Browning" them or when they are done?
Other than that sound cool, need to make that to my parents in 2 days when I visit them.

> [{quoted}](name=Smite Ezreal,realm=EUW,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=u78pishu,comment-id=002d,timestamp=2015-08-19T21:18:12.479+0000)
>
> So this "Kalista kebab" Why food coloring? Do you even see blue color after "Browning" them or when they are done?
> Other than that sound cool, need to make that to my parents in 2 days when I visit them.

The blue food coloring is for the wooden skewers - purely cosmetic so they look more like Kalista's spears.  You can choose not to color them if the appearances aren't your main concern.
